overview: Flesh on the Bones invites you to solve a fascinating mystery. A mystery with clues scattered over 200 million years of history. Where did dinosaurs live? How fast did they move? And most intriguing of all, were they warm or cold-blooded? Find out what actually happened before the "masters of the planet" suddenly died. Scientific detectives have dedicated their lives to solving these age-old mysteries. The answers they've come up with will amaze you: a Triceratops could outrun a Tyrannosaur; the foot claws of one specimen indicate they used aggressive, warm-blooded hunting techniques; and to escape chilly Alaska, dinosaurs went south for the winter! These and other discoveries make the dinosaur more fascinating than ever.
title: Flesh on the Bones
